name1:
Google Pay
https://pay.google.com

Say hello to a better relationship with money. Google Pay is a safe, simple, and helpful way to pay and manage your money. Send money to a friend or start a group to split expenses for dinner, bills, rent, and more. Google Pay will help you do the math and keep track of who's paid. You can also see where you made the most recent transaction, right on your homescreen. Find past purchases, loyalty cards, offers -- all in one place -- and keep credit cards, debit cards, transit passes, and more on your phone for quick, easy access.
